item.title: Re: community forums after Astorians
item.description: Thank you!  I will follow up with Subreddit.  All the best to you.

item.title: Re: community forums after Astorians
item.description: I bet you could ask the folks in the Astoria subreddit. Last I checked - and it was a while ago - they were rather salty but they might have some good ideas. Good luck!

item.title: Re: Shutting down astorians.com
item.description: Just logging on to say how much this forum meant to me while I lived in Astoria, a place I still feel connected to even though I live all the way across the country in Portland, OR. I met some great people though these forums, attended some awesome Ast...

item.title: Re: Shutting down astorians.com
item.description:
I am a new member and I posted this question a week or so ago and can't find it anywhere so I will post it here.
